[[File:Mega_Evolution_Example.png|thumb|A Shiny Contagious Lucario with its Mega Stone in the Pokedex Panel.]] '''Mega Evolution''' is a phenomenon capable of changing the Pokémon type, stats and form. For a Pokémon to be able to Mega Evolve you must obtain its Mega Stone and have 100x their base attack. Pokémon Mega Stones are shown under the Pokémon name in the Pokedex. ==Acquisition== You can find Mega Stones from [[Temporary Battles]], Dungeon Loot or by other means. The [[Key Stone]] is purchasable in the [[Shops#Kalos|Shalour City Shop]] for 25,000 {{battlepoints}}. ==Mega Pokémon== Currently, you can obtain the following Mega Pokémon: {|class="wikitable sortable" !
